resources.string: Super Human Strength and Agility. Maintains strength of normal size in shrunken state
Superhuman strength, intelligence, durability, endurance, speed. Hydro kinesis, Telepathic Control over Aquatic life.
Genius-Level Intellect, Expert Detective Utilizes high tech-equipment and weapons.
Expert hand-to-hand combatant and martial artist. Utilizing vibranium suit and equipment
Enhanced strength, speed, stamina, durability, agility, reflexes, senses, and mental processing via the super soldier serum. Accelerated healing.
Energy manipulation, absorption, and projection. "Seventh sense" granting flash precognition. Human/Kree physiology granting resistance to toxins and poisons.
Mastery of magic. Utilizes mystical artifacts, such as the Cloak of Levitation and the Eye of Agamotto.
Master archer and marksman. Uses a variety of trick arrows.
Shockwave generation. Gamma ray emission and manipulation.
Master martial artist. Utilizing concentrated chi in his fist called the \"Iron Fist\", a mystical weapon
Genius level intellect. Proficient scientist and engineer
Ability to cling to solid surfaces and ceilings. Precognitive spider-sense ability
Inter-dimensional teleportation. Electricity manipulation, Weather manipulation.
